pkgmetadata.longdescription: Runs Lotka's Law which is One of the Special Applications of Zipf's Law // Running Lotka's Law following Pao (1985)(DOI: 10.1016/0306-4573(85)90055-X). The Law is based around the proof that the number of authors making n contributions is about 1/n^{a} of those making one contribution.
